problem.p: A person is on a merry-go-round. The bar chart below describes the beginning and ending states of the merry-go-round.

p.b: Complete the bar chart by providing a value for the impulse using the drawing tool.

problem.p: Use your mouse (or finger on a tablet), to draw the appropriate bar to complete the graph. Please make sure your new bar is positioned in the center of the middle graphic.
